description: Healthy System - Control Case (No Agent Needed)
scenario: ML model correctly identifies normal operations with high confidence. No investigation needed.

ground_truth.why_edge_case: NOT an edge case - this is a control showing healthy system that doesn't need agent investigation

ml_model_view.reasoning: All metrics healthy: CPU 28%, Memory 42%, Response time 145ms, Error rate 0.8%, Throughput normal at 850 RPS. No anomalies detected. System operating within expected parameters.
ml_model_view.would_do: No action required. Continue standard monitoring. System healthy.

agent_investigation.root_cause: Agent investigation not needed - ML model highly confident and correct
agent_investigation.recommendation: Standard monitoring sufficient. High confidence (96%), all metrics normal, no intervention required.
agent_investigation.outcome: Efficient monitoring - no unnecessary investigation overhead. System continues normal operations.

ground_truth.hybrid_system_value: System correctly skips expensive agent investigation when ML model is confident and correct. Demonstrates cost-efficiency - agents only invoked when needed for edge cases, not for routine normal/incident classification.
